DOC.brief_summary: The use of topical anesthetics is a non invasive option avoiding local or general anesthesia in small gauge vitrectomy without causing intolerable pain
DOC.brief_title: Topical Anesthesia in Small Gauge Vitrectomy
DOC.criteria: Pseudofaquic or faquic, male or female, 18 to 80 years, primary vitrectomy Combined surgery Non cooperative patients
